sentence.Network_en: But Flopsy, Mopsy, and Cotton - tail had bread and milk and blackberries for supper.
sentence.Network_cn: 可佛洛普西 、 莫普西和棉球尾巴则以面包、牛奶、黑莓当晚餐.

sentence.Network_en: Flopsy, Mopsy and Cotton - tail, who were good little bunnies, went down the lane to gather blackberries.
sentence.Network_cn: 耷拉 、 毛毛和棉尾巴, 都是听话的兔宝宝, 沿着小路去采黑莓.

auth_sentence.content: Flopsy, Mopsy and Cottontail and Peter all laid down their lives for freedom.
auth_sentence.res_content: Flopsy, Mopsy and Cottontail and Peter all laid down their lives for freedom.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Flopsy, Mopsy and Cottontail and Peter all laid down their lives for freedom.

auth_sentence.content: Once upon a time there were four little Rabbits, and their names were Flopsy, Mopsy, Cotton-tail, and Peter.
auth_sentence.res_content: Once upon a time there were four little Rabbits, and their names were Flopsy, Mopsy, Cotton-tail, and Peter.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Once upon a time there were four little Rabbits, and their names were Flopsy, Mopsy, Cotton-tail, and Peter.
